description: Lists the Device Defender security profiles you've created. You can filter security profiles by dimension or custom metric. Requires permission to access the ListSecurityProfiles action.

nested_items.name: securityProfileIdentifiers
nested_items.description: A list of security profile identifiers (names and ARNs).

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name you've given to the security profile.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the security profile.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: A token that can be used to retrieve the next set of results, or null if there are no additional results.
